terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.subtitle: At Polaris, we believe legal terms should be as transparent as our technology. Here we explain simply how our platform works and what our commitments are to you.
terms.welcomeText: You're about to join thousands of people who are already building the future of digital democracy. These terms are your guide to making the most of our platform.

simplicity.title: Simplicity
simplicity.description: Clear and understandable terms for everyone

protection.title: Protection
protection.description: Your data and rights are completely protected

community.title: Community
community.description: Building a more democratic future together

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: Advanced technology at the service of people

basics.title: The Basics You Need to Know
basics.description: Polaris is your SaaS platform for creating and managing democratic communities. Here you can vote, propose projects, manage funds, and see the real impact of your decisions.
basics.rules: Follow the rules of each community

account.title: Your Account and Participation
account.createTitle: Creating your account is easy and free
account.createDescription: You just need to register with your email. To participate in important votes or handle funds, we'll ask you to verify your identity (it's for security).
account.canDoTitle: As a Polaris member you can:
account.track: See transparent results in real time
account.earn: Earn rewards for your active participation

security.title: Maximum Security
security.description: Your data is protected with blockchain technology and bank-level encryption.

transparency.title: Total Transparency
transparency.description: All votes and funds are traceable. No surprises, no secrets.

innovation.title: Constant Innovation
innovation.description: We constantly improve based on your feedback and needs.

support.title: Human Support
support.description: Our team is here to help you. Guaranteed response in 24 hours.

rules.title: Golden Rules for a Healthy Community
rules.respectDescription: Polaris is a safe space for everyone. We do not tolerate discrimination, harassment, or behaviors that harm the community experience.

blockchain.title: Blockchain Technology: Simple but Powerful
blockchain.whyDescription: Because it guarantees that your votes and fund transactions are immutable and verifiable by all. It's like having a digital notary that never lies.
blockchain.fundsTracked: Funds are tracked with total transparency

legal.title: Legal Aspects (No Complications)
legal.jurisdictionDescription: Polaris is regulated under Swiss law, known for its stability and data protection. This gives you maximum legal security.
legal.gdpr: We comply with GDPR and Swiss regulations
legal.access: You can access, correct, or delete your information

support.title: We're Always Here for You
support.description: Have questions about our platform or need assistance? We're here to help you make the most of your Polaris experience.

updates.title: Changes and Updates
updates.description: When we update these terms (always to improve), we'll notify you 30 days in advance by email and on the platform. We'll never make surprise changes that affect your rights.

future.title: Let's Build the Future Together!
future.description: These terms are not just legality, they are our commitment to creating the best digital democratic experience in the world.
future.questions: Have questions about these terms? Write to us at legal@polaris-platform.com

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.subtitle: Your privacy is fundamental to everything we do. Here's how we protect your data while building transparent, democratic communities.
privacy.welcomeText: At Polaris, privacy isn't an afterthought—it's built into every feature. We believe you can have both transparency and privacy working together.

transparency.title: Radical Transparency
transparency.description: We clearly explain what data we collect, how we use it, and why we need it.

security.title: Bank-Level Security
security.description: Your data is protected with enterprise-grade encryption and blockchain technology.

control.title: Your Data, Your Control
control.description: You have complete control over your data and can request deletion at any time.

community.title: Community Privacy
community.description: We respect the privacy of community decisions while maintaining necessary transparency.

basics.title: What We Collect (And Why)
basics.description: We only collect what's necessary to provide you with the best democratic participation experience.

personal.title: Personal Information
personal.description: Your basic profile information to verify identity and enable community participation.

activity.title: Platform Activity
activity.description: Your voting history and community interactions to ensure platform integrity.

technical.title: Technical Data
technical.description: Usage analytics to improve platform performance and user experience.

usage.title: How We Use Your Data
usage.description: Every piece of data has a purpose that benefits you and your community.

platform.title: Platform Functionality
platform.description: To provide secure, reliable democratic governance tools for your community.

communication.title: Smart Communication
communication.description: To send only relevant updates about votes, proposals, and platform improvements.

improvement.title: Continuous Improvement
improvement.description: To make the platform better based on how real communities use it.

protection.title: Your Data Protection
protection.description: We use cutting-edge technology to keep your information secure and private.

blockchain.title: Blockchain Security
blockchain.description: Immutable records with privacy protection where it matters most.

encryption.title: Enterprise Encryption
encryption.description: Bank-level security for all your sensitive information.

compliance.title: Swiss Compliance
compliance.description: Meeting the highest international standards for data protection.

rights.title: Your Rights & Control
rights.description: You're in complete control of your data. Here's what you can do:
rights.export: Export your data in standard formats

contact.title: Questions About Privacy?
contact.description: Our privacy team is here to help you understand exactly how we protect your data.

updates.title: Policy Updates
updates.description: We'll notify you 30 days before any significant changes to this policy. Your privacy matters too much for surprises.

about.title: Building the Future of
about.subtitle: Community Governance
about.description: Polaris Platform was born from the belief that every community deserves a voice in shaping its future. We're creating tools that make democratic participation accessible, transparent, and impactful.
about.missionText: We envision a world where communities have the tools and resources to solve their own challenges through collaborative decision-making and transparent funding mechanisms.
about.valuesDescription: These core principles guide everything we do and shape how we build technology for communities.
about.teamDescription: We're a diverse group of technologists, community organizers, and civic engagement experts united by a shared vision of democratic empowerment.
about.communityFirstDesc: We believe in the power of collective decision-making and community-driven initiatives.
about.transparencyDesc: Every vote, every fund allocation, and every decision is recorded on the blockchain for full transparency.
about.socialImpactDesc: Our platform is designed to create meaningful, lasting change in communities worldwide.
about.globalReachDesc: Connecting communities across borders to share resources, ideas, and best practices.
about.blockchainText: Through blockchain technology, we ensure that every voice is heard, every vote counts, and every peso is tracked from proposal to implementation.

ceo.title: CEO & Co-Founder
ceo.description: We are looking for a visionary leader with experience in civic tech and the ability to inspire and drive Polaris Platform towards global impact.
ceo.requirements:
• 5+ years of leadership experience in tech or civic engagement
• Strong storytelling and fundraising skills
• Experience in product vision and strategy
• Passion for democratic empowerment and community building
ceo.benefits:
• Equity participation in a mission-driven company
• Competitive salary and benefits
• Opportunity to shape the future of community governance
• Work with a passionate, diverse team
ceo.responsibilities:
• Define and execute the company vision and strategy
• Lead fundraising efforts and investor relations
• Build partnerships with communities and organizations
• Represent Polaris Platform at conferences and events

community.title: Head of Community
community.description: Responsible for building and engaging our community, executing growth strategies, moderating forums, and educating about digital democracy.
community.requirements:
• 3+ years of community management experience
• Deep understanding of civic engagement and democratic processes
• Strong communication and moderation skills
• Experience with social media and community platforms
community.benefits:
• Competitive salary and equity
• Opportunity to build communities worldwide
• Professional development budget
• Remote-first work environment
community.responsibilities:
• Develop and execute community growth strategies
• Moderate community discussions and forums
• Create educational content about digital democracy
• Organize community events and workshops

product.title: Head of Product
product.description: Product designer with SaaS experience who can build inclusive and engaging flows for our democratic governance platform.
product.requirements:
• 4+ years of product design experience
• Experience with SaaS products and user research
• Strong UX/UI skills and portfolio
• Understanding of accessibility and inclusive design
product.benefits:
• Competitive salary and equity participation
• Latest design tools and equipment
• Opportunity to impact democratic processes
• Collaborative, design-focused team
product.responsibilities:
• Lead product design and user experience
• Conduct user research and usability testing
• Create inclusive design systems
• Collaborate with engineering on product development

marketing.title: Growth & Marketing Lead
marketing.description: Plan and execute marketing campaigns and social media strategies, manage content creation and drive user growth.
marketing.requirements:
• 3+ years of marketing experience, preferably in tech
• Strong social media and content creation skills
• Experience with growth hacking and user acquisition
• Understanding of civic tech or social impact sectors
marketing.benefits:
• Competitive salary and equity
• Marketing budget and tools
• Opportunity to promote democratic values
• Creative freedom and autonomy
marketing.responsibilities:
• Develop and execute marketing strategies
• Manage social media presence and content
• Create compelling marketing materials
• Drive user acquisition and growth metrics
